[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#BF9A46″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin_tablet=”||43px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||35px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” link_option_url=”/the-facts/” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Click Here for some helpful (and safe) porn facts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Gold-home-page-link-background2.jpg” background_size=”custom” background_image_width=”180%” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”114px|35px|114px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”114px|35px|114px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”114px|35px|114px|35px|true|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element=”margin: auto;” border_width_all=”10px” border_color_all=”#FFFFFF” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ global_colors_info=”{}” transform_styles__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover_enabled=”on|hover” transform_translate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_rotate__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_skew__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_origin__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” transform_scale__hover=”102%|102%” transform_rotate__hover=”0deg|0deg|3deg”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”33px” text_line_height=”1em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Want some staff or parent training?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” link_option_url=”mailto:hello@thelightproject.co.nz” text_orientation_tablet=”” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Contact us HERE

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”footer-quote-block” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F6F3EF” z_index=”2″ custom_margin=”||-15vh||false|false” custom_padding=”80px|80px|80px|80px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|20px|20px|20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-1b27fc3d-7579-4286-975a-244b5a16c6f4%22:%91%93,%22gcid-a394b62d-6ad6-4a00-840a-6f56a4918f0b%22:%91%93}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_line_height=”1.9em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

For many children and young people in Aotearoa, porn is as close as the nearest phone. That simple fact fundamentally changes everything we knew, or thought we knew, about porn and young people. Porn is now a fact of life for young people.”

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

— David Shanks, Chief Censor, OFLC, 2018.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_stops=”#ffffff 0%|rgba(0,0,0,0) 30%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”30%” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/home-page-8-people-on-phones-.jpg” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”500px” height_phone=”500px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.16″ height=”800px” height_tablet=”300px” height_phone=”200px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” max_height_tablet=”300px” max_height_phone=”200px” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Tēnā koe and welcome to the porn conversation!LearnNeed Help?Hi There! It’s great you’re here.Over the last 5 years, a whole new porn landscape for young people has emerged… with how much porn’s out there, its easy-access, the type of porn that’s mainstream, how it’s shaping youth sexual culture.We’ve teamed up with some experts and put […]
